title: The Guild
description: The Guild was a project I worked on in Le Wagon alongside 3 other developers in a 2-week timespan. It is a platform for gaming guild management, allowing users to create and manage their guild members in one platform eliminating the need for multiple platforms. It features a live chat and a calendar to show events.

title: Rent-a-peer
description: Rent-a-peer was a project I worked on in Le Wagon alongside the same 3 developers in a 1-week timespan before we worked on The Guild. It's a platform for renting services from other users, it is named rent-a-peer because we thought it was funny. As our first project it's not very polished.

title: Destiny loadout manager
description: Destiny Loadout Manager is a project I'm working on solo in my free time. It's a web app that allows users to manage their Destiny 2 loadouts. It's built with React and uses the Bungie API to fetch the user's Destiny 2 data. The API is built with Ruby on Rails. It's still a work in progress.

title: Chatapp
description: Chatapp is a simple chat application I built to learn more about using rails as an API. It's built with React, TypeScript and Ruby on Rails. It's a simple application that allows users to create servers, channels and then chat in said channels. It follows a very simple design, as I'm not much of a designer, but I tried my best. It's a slight work in progress but I'm nearing completion of the project.
